description: Returns personalized daily meal plan with protein calculations, meal timing, Indian non-veg food items, prep instructions, and Google Calendar event creation status for each meal

food_items: 3 eggs (omelette with onions, tomatoes, green chilies)
meals.prep_instructions: Beat 3 eggs with chopped onions, tomatoes, green chilies and a pinch of salt. Cook on a non-stick pan for 5 minutes. Serve with a glass of milk.

meals.meal_name: Mid-morning Snack - Greek Yogurt with Roasted Chana
meals.prep_instructions: Take 1 cup Greek yogurt and top with roasted chana. Mix and enjoy.

meals.meal_name: Lunch - Grilled Chicken Breast & Mixed Veg
food_items: Steamed mixed vegetables (carrot, beans, peas) 1 cup
meals.prep_instructions: Marinate chicken breast with salt, pepper, turmeric, and chili powder. Grill or cook in a pan with a little oil for 7-8 minutes each side. Steam 1 cup mixed vegetables.
Marinate paneer cubes in curd with salt, tikka masala/spices for 5 min. Pan-roast or grill on skewers for 8-10 min.
Marinate fish with turmeric, chili powder, salt and lemon. Pan-fry for 4-5 min each side. Serve with fresh salad.

result.summary: Your easy-prep Indian non-veg meal plan for shredding and muscle gain hits your daily protein goal of 134g. Each meal is bachelor-friendly, quick to cook, and rich in high-quality protein. Calendar reminders have been scheduled for each meal to keep you on track.
